snippet.title: 2021 Ninjaman Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
2021 Ninjaman Teaser Trailer

Ninjaman is an 8-bit platformer where you throw love at zombies to turn them into homies and no one ever really gets hurt or dies. Because there is a Ninja With A Gold Chain. Are you the one? Can you save the city of Atlantokyo and get the party started with love? Let's go!

Please follow Ninjaman on Instagram & Twitter:  @ninjamangame
